conbody.p: Eucalyptus provides a command-line interface (CLI), called "Euca2ools." The remainder of this guide uses Euca2ools. These tools conform to the command-line tools that Amazon distributes as part of thier EC2 service (EC2 tools). If you want to use a free web-based graphical tool to interact with your Eucalyptus cloud, see .
conbody.note: You can use either help pages or man pages to view information about Euca2ools commands and associated options. To see a help page, enter <commandName> --help. To see a man page, enter man <commandName>. For example, to get help for the euca-bundle-images command, enter either euca-bundle-image --help or man euca-bundle-image.
